channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
1.How can i make it instead of Spawning in Fally u do in Varrock right when u login? 2.How can i add npcs in varrock? 3.How can i make npcs say stuff????
BTW-im using LOL source[br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2007, 10:59:40 AM[/size][hr]help me plz~!

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @mopar_I mopar I
item.description:
@mopar_I wrote:

Answer to Q1: Tele to varrock and look at your coords (click on the tab the lets you see your run energy) then go to player.java search for:

teleportToX teleportToY

Change the coords of where you want new players to spawn in varrock after it.

Answer to Q3: Go to NPChandler.java and search what the Npc’s already say. Heres an example,

"Welcome to_____Scape!"

ONLY change what is in the quotations.

Answer to Q2: Go to The “help” tab on top of moparscape. Go down till you see “NPC I’ds” click it and search the npc you want to spawn. Heres an example

::npc [Code #]

Hope this helps :D.

Read full topic
